hudson.tasks.Shell.command: export VMNAME="RC-$$-MM" /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init login /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'wget http://esb3.metacentrum.cz/rsyslog2.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog-client.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x mongomine.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'ps faxu' /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog_installed.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x mongomine/tests/mongomine.sh'
